title: Kimchi Butter Recipe
full_text:
Kimchi Butter Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
10
to 11 servings
Makes
5 1/2 ounces
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
stick
unsalted butter
(
4
ounces
;
115
g
), softened
1 1/2
ounces
(
45
g
)
kimchi with liquid
, chopped
Directions
Combine butter and kimchi in the bowl of a food processor (see note). Pulse until combined. (It may take a few pulses to fully incorporate the kimchi liquid.) Wrap butter tightly and store in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks or in the freezer for several months.
Special equipment
Food processor (see note)
Notes
Instead of using a food processor, you can incorporate the kimchi and butter using a fork in a bowl.
Condiments & Sauces
Butter
